headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EINBENDER, ALVIN H

snippet: EINBENDER--Alvin H. The Yeshiva University family is saddened by the passing of Alvin H. Einbender, a founder and honorary overseer of the Sy Syms School of Business. He established a Chair in Business Ethics at the school in 1987. He and his wife, Joan, are among the deeply cherished leaders of our institution. Heartfelt condolences are extended to his wife Joan, and their children Alison, Jay, Gail and Karen, his sons-in-law Paul Jacobson and Rink Smith, and grandchildren. May they be comforted among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3

Heartfelt condolences are extended to his wife Joan, and their children Alison, Jay, Gail and Karen, his sons-in-law Paul Jacobson and Rink Smith, and grandchildren. May they be comforted among all who mourn for Zion and Jerusalem. Yeshiva University Richard M. Joel, President Norman Lamm, President Emeritus 1/3
